3.name: Progressive GBP
3.description: The amount of GBP you get per message is determined by how much gbp you have. Reduced farming rate doesn't affect messages sent in Non-Farming channels.The rates are below

4.name: Daily Lottery
4.description: Everyday everyone is automatically entered into the Daily lottery which gives you a 1 in 250 chance of getting 1000 gbp

5.name: Welfare
5.description:
Everyone who has less than 250 gbp in total assets (banked + unbanked gbp) qualifies for welfare
You are either given 250 gbp or enough gbp to reach 250 gbp in total assets
